properties.title: IBM Spectrum Archive Single Drive Edition 2.2.2.0 (9802)

pkmkdoc.description: This package installs the IBM Spectrum Archive.

requirement.message-title: Unable to install IBM Spectrum Archive
requirement.message: The IBM Spectrum Archive have not been tested with versions of OS X earlier than 10.6.

requirement.message-title: Unable to install IBM Spectrum Archive
requirement.message: The OSXFUSE version 2.3.4 or later is not installed on this system.

requirement.message-title: Unable to install IBM Spectrum Archive
requirement.message: The ICU framework version 4.8.1.1 is not installed on this system. The ICU framework version 4.8.1.1 is bandled to the IBM Spectrum Archive installer image file.
